StaticSkill.DiscoveryMessage: You walk into the scene of a crime, the stand by the pool having been robbed. Your curiously look around while others are distracted. A calling card on the counter draws your attention and upon viewing it you recognize there is power in the words upon it. You do your best to memorize the magical essence it describes forming the spell within your mind. Just as you finish you are yelled at and shuffled off the scene.
StaticSkill.Description: Give your foe a taste for the shadows and a life of furry crime.
